data.name: Az204Descripcion
data.value: Cloud application development and infrastructure management

data.name: contratoPracticasGnossDescripcion
data.value: Mandatory internship during the degree. Client-side web development (BBVA), D4R project (Data for Reputation).

data.name: contratoPracticasHiberus1Descripcion
data.value: Development of my final degree project within the company. During this period I developed a microservice to add functionality to an existing application, automating processes related to human resources management.

data.name: contratoPracticasHiberus2Descripcion
data.value: Development of a .NET Core application for human resources and personnel management.

data.name: CssHtmlMVPDescripcion
data.value: Development and layout of pages using HTML and CSS

data.name: CssHtmlMVPTitulo
data.value: HTML and CSS in depth for developers

data.name: descripcionCloudComputing
data.value: General knowledge across different areas of Cloud Computing

data.name: descripcionContenedoresDocker
data.value: Courses aimed at learning the basics of container usage and their application in software projects.

data.name: descripcionCursoMaui
data.value: This course covers the new cross-platform application development framework with a single codebase and basic .NET 6 concepts.

data.name: descripcionIntroduccionDesarrolloWeb
data.value: Courses aimed at learning basic web development concepts using HTML5, CSS and JavaScript

data.name: descripcionPersonal1
data.value: The technologies I specialize in are mainly the ASP.NET Core technology stack.

data.name: descripcionPersonal2
data.value: My preferences are application development and CI/CD processes.

data.name: descripcionProgramacionNET
data.value: Basic aspects of .NET programming are studied from front to back, mainly using MVC and SQL Server.

data.name: descripcionSobreMi2
data.value: Since I was a child I wanted to study computer science as a way to improve people's lives and contribute to progress. I also enjoy music, traveling, sports or simply reading a good book or watching a series.

data.name: descripcionSobreMi3
data.value: I consider myself a consistent and hard-working person and believe that my main skill is teamwork.

data.name: descripcionUniversidad
data.value: DEGREE IN COMPUTER ENGINEERING AND SOFTWARE ENGINEERING

data.name: programadorWebJuniorHiberusDescripcion1
data.value: My work at the Government of Navarra can be divided into two areas: GAD and Housing.

data.name: programadorWebJuniorHiberusDescripcion2
data.value: The GAD team (Development Architecture Group) is a transversal team whose main role is to support developers in aspects related to development and integration of their products in the CI/CD process. I have collaborated on CI/CD using tools like Jenkins and improved code quality through automated QA processes with SonarQube, as well as researching and proposing new technologies to meet organizational needs.

data.name: programadorWebJuniorHiberusDescripcion3
data.value: In the housing area, my responsibilities include maintenance and improvement tasks for the different products in this area. These products are mainly maintained with .NET Framework technologies (primarily WebForms).

data.name: programadorWebJuniorHiberusSubTitulo
data.value: JUNIOR WEB DEVELOPER FOR THE GOVERNMENT OF NAVARRA

data.name: subtituloPersonal
data.value: Graduate from the University of La Rioja in Computer Engineering with a specialization in Software Engineering.

data.name: tituloIntroduccionDesarrolloWeb
data.value: INTRODUCTION TO WEB DEVELOPMENT I & II
